page.title: 19Dores/Abriachan_Hall
page.content: Dores Village Hall is used by many members of the community for a variety of purposes.Committee meetings are frequently held there.Badminton classes take place for the children.Until recently the youth club met there for Unihoc etc.A Christmas Party is held every year for children up to 12.Burns Suppers are well attended .Aldourie School uses the Hall at certain times for P.E.The Hall is also available for private hire for birthday parties etc.In many ways the Hall is a real centre of community life.
